class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 26 - June 29, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: PORT 314 is designed to interweave the arts and language acquisition. The students will be exposed to a vast array of meaningful artistic production, via the literary, performing, and visual arts. The focus will be better understanding Lisbon as a space of artistic encounters.
prerequisites: PORT 201 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1448, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Teixeira, Status: Open
